org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics

类 AbstractAggregatingMetricsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.AbstractJsonRequestHandler
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics.AbstractAggregatingMetricsHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RequestHandler
    直接已知子类:
    AggregatingJobsMetricsHandler, AggregatingSubtasksMetricsHandler, AggregatingTaskManagersMetricsHandler

    abstract class AbstractAggregatingMetricsHandler
extends AbstractJsonRequestHandler
    Abstract request handler for querying aggregated metrics. Subclasses return either a list of all available metrics or the aggregated values of them across all/selected entities.

    If the query parameters do not contain a "get" parameter the list of all metrics is returned. [ { "id" : "X" } ]

    If the query parameters do contain a "get" parameter, a comma-separated list of metric names is expected as a value. /metrics?get=X,Y The handler will then return a list containing the values of the requested metrics. [ { "id" : "X", "value" : "S" }, { "id" : "Y", "value" : "T" } ]

    The "agg" query parameter is used to define which aggregates should be calculated. Available aggregations are "sum", "max", "min" and "avg". If the parameter is not specified, all aggregations will be returned. /metrics?get=X,Y&agg=min,max The handler will then return a list of objects containing the aggregations for the requested metrics. [ { "id" : "X", "min", "1", "max", "2" }, { "id" : "Y", "min", "4", "max", "10"}]

      • handleJsonRequest

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> handleJsonRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pathParams,
                                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParams,
                                                                                  JobManagerGateway jobManagerGateway)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractJsonRequestHandler
        Core method that handles the request and generates the response. The method needs to respond with a valid JSON string. Exceptions may be thrown and will be handled.
        指定者:
        handleJsonRequest 在类中 AbstractJsonRequestHandler
        参数:
        pathParams - The map of REST path parameters, decoded by the router.
        queryParams - The map of query parameters.
        jobManagerGateway - to communicate with the JobManager.
        返回:
        The JSON string that is the HTTP response.

      • getAvailableMetrics

        private static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAvailableMetrics(java.util.Collection<? extends MetricStore.ComponentMetricStore> stores)
        Returns a JSON string containing a list of all available metrics in the given stores. Effectively this method maps the union of all key-sets to JSON.
        参数:
        stores - metrics
        返回:
        JSON string containing a list of all available metrics

      • getAggregatedMetricValues

        private java.lang.String getAggregatedMetricValues(java.util.Collection<? extends MetricStore.ComponentMetricStore> stores,
                                                   java.lang.String[] requestedMetrics,
                                                   java.util.List<DoubleAccumulator.DoubleAccumulatorFactory<?>> requestedAggregationsFactories)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts and aggregates all requested metrics from the given metric stores, and maps the result to a JSON string.
        参数:
        stores - available metrics
        requestedMetrics - ids of requested metrics
        requestedAggregationsFactories - requested aggregations
        返回:
        JSON string containing the requested metrics
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
